name: MC
text: I hate it here. It's so boring!

name: Mentor
text: You've been saying that all morning, since mom woke you up.

name: Mentor
text: I promise it won't be that bad.

name: MC
text: Even so, school IS NOT FOR ME!!

name: Mentor
text: If you're too old for this, than what am I?

name: Mentor
text: Let your elderly brother give you a little tour.

name: Mentor
text: I know this place like the back of my hand.
